text: Pavetta holstii is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==Sources== * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Pavetta holstii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Tanzania holstii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pavetta holstii
